Class CanvasWindow

  • Direct Known Subclasses:

    public class CanvasWindow
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      protected CanvasWindow​(java.lang.String title)
      Initializes a CanvasWindow object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected void handleKeyEvent​(int id, int keyCode, char keyChar)
      Called when the user presses a key (id == KeyEvent.KEY_PRESSED) or enters a character (id == KeyEvent.KEY_TYPED).
      protected void handleMouseEvent​(int id, int x, int y, int clickCount)
      Called when the user presses (id == MouseEvent.MOUSE_PRESSED), releases (id == MouseEvent.MOUSE_RELEASED), or drags (id == MouseEvent.MOUSE_DRAGGED) the mouse.
      protected void paint​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Called to allow you to paint on the canvas.
      void recordSession​(java.lang.String path)  
      protected void repaint​()
      Call this method if the canvas is out of date and needs to be repainted.
      static void replayRecording​(java.lang.String path, CanvasWindow window)  
      void show​()

    • Constructor Detail

      • CanvasWindow

        protected CanvasWindow​(java.lang.String title)
        Initializes a CanvasWindow object.
        Parameters:
        title - Window title

    • Method Detail

      • recordSession

        public final void recordSession​(java.lang.String path)

      • repaint

        protected final void repaint​()
        Call this method if the canvas is out of date and needs to be repainted. This will cause method paint(Graphics) to be called after the current call of method handleMouseEvent or handleKeyEvent finishes.

      • paint

        protected void paint​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Called to allow you to paint on the canvas. You should not use the Graphics object after you return from this method.
        Parameters:
        g - This object offers the methods that allow you to paint on the canvas.

      • handleMouseEvent

        protected void handleMouseEvent​(int id,
                                int x,
                                int y,
                                int clickCount)
        Called when the user presses (id == MouseEvent.MOUSE_PRESSED), releases (id == MouseEvent.MOUSE_RELEASED), or drags (id == MouseEvent.MOUSE_DRAGGED) the mouse.
        Parameters:
        e - Details about the event

      • handleKeyEvent

        protected void handleKeyEvent​(int id,
                              int keyCode,
                              char keyChar)
        Called when the user presses a key (id == KeyEvent.KEY_PRESSED) or enters a character (id == KeyEvent.KEY_TYPED).
        Parameters:
        e -
